name: vacuum (James Bourassa)
description:
An asteroid just hit the space station!

You're a new astronaut. I get it, you're just getting used to how things work. I would ask the maintenance crew to check it out, but they've been gone for a little while. Maybe it has something to do with the experiments you were contracted for...

Anyway, as the new guy, it's your job to survey the ship and go on a spacewalk to see what the damage is. I'm sure it's fine. Bring back a report once you see what's happening.
